alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley to 8 miles south of Hendry Correctional. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Big Cypress National Preserve, South Blocks Golde, Sunniland, Picayune Strand State Forest, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City and Deep Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
